AboutMe.title: About me
AboutMe.p1: I'm 26 years old and a <strong1>Systems Engineer</strong1> graduated from UNICEN. I've always been passionate about computers: since I was a kid, I was fascinated by understanding how they worked and building things with them. Today I work as a fullstack developer, with special interest in smooth, well-thought mobile applications.
AboutMe.p2: In my day-to-day, I use Linux because I like having total control over my development environment (and honestly, almost anything is better than Windows). I'm passionate about creating software that's useful, maintainable, and doesn't make users suffer.
AboutMe.p3: Outside of code, I love animals â€”I have a calico cat named Graciela who thinks she owns the keyboardâ€” and movies. Quentin Tarantino is my favorite director and Kill Bill is my all-time favorite movie.
AboutMe.p4: I describe myself as an old soul: I prefer steady, well-done work over unnecessary rush. As Uncle Bob says: "The only way to go fast, is to go well." I enjoy collaborating in teams, teaching what I know, and learning from others. I always seek simple solutions to complex problems, because elegance tends to be the most effective.
